body:
Comment 7: 
No, I guess not.  From our existing docs:

"The returned map, params, maps from the lowercase attribute to the attribute value with
its case preserved."

So I guess it's a bit harder than string.Contains, but not much.  It's always ASCII, at
least, making a little containsFold(s, sub string) bool function in the mime package
easy & fast, if that's what you're concerned about.
